About

My name is Adam Hawkins. I am web application developer who uses Ruby on Rails and Javascript. I currently live in Helsinki. I'm the lead developer on a CRM right now and post rails tips and tricks here. You can follow me on twitter @adman65. You can see my code on Github or contact me on LinkedIn. You can also catch me on freenode as Adman65 in #rubyonrails or #railsbridge. Please get connect with me on Google+.
